School Holiday Programs

Fun and engaging gymnastics programs during school holidays

Holiday Programs

Keep your children active and engaged during school holidays with our exciting gymnastics programs. Each holiday period offers unique activities designed for different age groups and skill levels.

Spring

Term 3, 2025

Start: 29 September 2025
End: 10 October 2025

Operating Information

Extended hours available for holiday programs.

Available Programs

Spring Break Blast

High-energy program combining gymnastics with team games.

7-15 years
Book Now
Tiny Tumblers

Introduction to gymnastics for our youngest participants.

3-6 years
Book Now
Last updated: 1 December 2024
Winter

Term 2, 2025

Start: 7 July 2025
End: 18 July 2025

Operating Information

Heated facility ensures comfortable training year-round.

Available Programs

Winter Warriors

Stay active during winter with our indoor gymnastics program.

6-14 years
Book Now
Competition Prep

Intensive training for upcoming competitions.

10-18 years
Book Now
Last updated: 1 December 2024
Autumn

Term 1, 2025

Start: 14 April 2025
End: 25 April 2025

Operating Information

Normal operating hours throughout the break.

Available Programs

Spring Skills Workshop

Focus on specific skills development with expert coaching.

8-16 years
Book Now
Parent & Child Play

Special sessions for parents and children to play together.

2-5 years
Book Now
Last updated: 1 December 2024
Summer

Term 4, 2024

Start: 20 December 2024
End: 27 January 2025

Operating Information

Closed December 25-26 and January 1. Limited hours December 24 and 31.

Available Programs

Summer Fun Camp

A week-long gymnastics adventure with games, skills, and fun activities.

5-12 years
Book Now
Teen Intensive

Advanced training program for serious gymnasts.

13-17 years
Book Now
Last updated: 1 December 2024

Contact us for more information about our holiday programs or to discuss which program is right for your child.
